personalPreferencesDescriptionSectionPar: To improve your customer experience, we may capture information on how you use the services on our network.
personalPreferencesMoreContentFirstParag: Data such as the user and quality of your connectivity services, network traffic data, and location helps us personalise our services and tailor recommendations to you.
personalPreferencesMoreContentSecondPara: Occasionally we may also inform you about offers and services from one of our partners if we think they many be of interest to you.
personalPreferencesMoreContentThirdParag: You can control the information we collect and user in three ways and can update it at any time:
personalPreferencesMoreContentFirstBulle: Using the privacy setting options below to control what data you want to use from our network
personalPreferencesMoreContentSecondBull: Each Vodafone app has it owns settings that you can control within the app.
personalPreferencesMoreContentThirdBulle: By controlling how cookies are used within your browser
personalPreferencesMoreContentFirstInfoS: Information about how you use our products and services and where you use our network
personalPreferencesMoreContentSecondInfo: We can provide you with the latest offers on our products and services tailored to you, with personalised customer service, and ensure the mobile network is available where you use it the most.

onboarding_3rd_party_permissions_descrip:
To allow you to use our website and apps conveniently and see the content personalised for you, we use cookies, tags, pixels and similar technologies with your consent. Depending on whether you are currently on the website or in the app, and whether you give your consent on the website or in the app, access to our website and app is measured and social media and marketing functions are implemented with your consent. With your consent, we also share information with our partners and social networks for analysis, advertising and marketing purposes. These partners may combine the information collected here with other information you provide or with other information collected through the use of the services.

In addition, with your consent, we store a cookie on all devices assigned to you, which allows us to store the settings you have made here across all your devices and to provide you with personalised offers. Which devices are assigned to you is determined by your recognised IP address, your telephone number, your login to our website or your newsletter registration.

Click on ‘Accept and continue’ to accept all cookies or on ‘Settings’ to learn more about the cookies used on the website or in the app and to choose a personal cookie setting. You can revoke or amend your consent at any time here.
onboarding_3rd_party_permissions_subtitl: Please choose and confirm your settings. You can always change them later.
onboarding_3rd_party_permissions_li_opt_: Analysis cookies (to optimize the website and app)

These cookies allow us to understand how visitors behave on our website and in our app, e.g. how long they spend on a page on average, whether they return and how often. This allows us to continuously improve our website and app. You can find more information here: www.vodafone.de/datenschutz .
onboarding_3rd_party_permissions_li_om_t: Marketing and social network cookies (personalised advertisement)
onboarding_3rd_party_permissions_li_om_d: These cookies are used to evaluate your browsing behaviour and to show you offers that are important or interesting to you. These cookies can also follow you to other websites and are therefore valuable to third party advertisers and publishers. We also share this information with our analytics, marketing and social network partners. If you have a profile on social networks and are logged in, the respective provider of the social network supplements your user profile with information about your browsing behaviour. You can find more information here: www.vodafone.de/datenschutz .
onboarding_3rd_party_permissions_li_nba_: Wenn Du Dich auf unserer Website oder in unserer App als Nutzer einloggst oder sie besuchst und wir Dich an Deiner IP-Adresse oder Deiner Rufnummer erkennen, ordnen wir Dir alle Geräte zu, die Du beim Surfen auf unseren Seiten genutzt hast und die wir erkannt haben. Das klappt mit einem Cookie. Dabei werden diese Infos genutzt, um die von Dir vorgenommenen Einstellungen geräteübergreifend zu speichern. Und um Dir unabhängig vom genutzten Gerät personalisierte Angebote machen zu können. Dafür nutzen wir nicht Dein Surf-Verhalten. Wenn Du Dich für unseren Newsletter anmeldest, werden wir Dich mit diesem Cookie identifizieren und auch Deine Anmeldung Dir zuordnen können. Mehr Infos findest Du hier: www.vodafone.de/datenschutz .

netperform_tips_and_tricks: Tips and tricks for faster network speed
netperform_tips_and_tricks_signal_weak: Is your phone signal weak? Some rural areas have weaker signals and will affect your data connection. Your speeds may improve if you move location.
netperform_tips_and_tricks_still_slow_de: Check FAQs for more information on getting faster connection, or get in touch if you're having problems.
netperform_tips_and_tricks_your_data_pla: Depending on your plan, your data speeds may be capped. You can look at your plan to see if you want to upgrade for better speeds.

onboarding_bew_permissions_step_subtitle: Help us to make our online world even better.
onboarding_bew_permissions_step_descript: We are committed to improving your customer experience of our products, services and recommendations. To do that, we need your help and some information about you and your user behaviour. You can revoke your consent in full or in part at any time with future effect.
onboarding_bew_permissions_DEV_descripti:
I consent to the Vodafone companies’ contacting me by telephone or by electronic post (e.g. email, messenger, SMS, and MMS) regarding products and services for marketing purposes and market research.

I understand that I can revoke this consent at any time in full or in part with future effect.
onboarding_bew_permissions_ADV_descripti:
I consent to the Vodafone companies’ use of my usage data, location data and other data which are collected and shared to personalise my telemedia and telecommunication service experience to my needs, for marketing purposes and to provide value-add services to me.

I understand that I can revoke this consent at any time in full or in part with future effect.
onboarding_bew_netperform_toggle_title: Allow network & service improvements based on personalised data
onboarding_bew_netperform_toggle_descrip:
It's great that you want to use the MeinVodafone app.
You can see your most important contract information in the app so you have full control over your usage and your information. You can find help in the online chat - any time, anywhere.

Better network and better service
We want to make our products, services and recommendations even better for you. For this we need your help and some information about you and your usage behaviour.

What information do we get?
For example, we regularly receive personalised information on network coverage, the quality of your calls and data connections, and the apps you use.

We do not receive any information about the content of your conversations or messages.

We use your personalised information e.g. to:
- To give you more transparency about your personal data usage.
- To discover and correct any performance restrictions when using your apps or your smartphone.
- To recommend products & services to you specifically for your contract.

We would like to make our products, services and recommendations even better for you. To do this, we need your help and some information about you and your usage behaviour, such as personalised information on network coverage, the quality of your calls and data connections, and the apps you use.

We do not receive any information about the content of your conversations or messages.

We use your personalised information in certain cases, e.g:
- To give you more transparency about your personal data usage.
- To discover and correct any performance restrictions when using your apps or your smartphone.
- To recommend products & services specifically for your contract.

settings_netperform_non_personalized_inf:
What's the benefit to you?
We use your non-personalised information in certain cases, e.g.:

 • To improve our network coverage and connection quality

 • Avoid malfunctions and fix them more quickly
settings_netperform_personalized_info_to: Send personalised data to customise help, products, services and recommendations

What's the benefit to you?
We would like to make our products, services and recommendations even better for you. To do this, we need your help and some information about you und your usage behaviour, such as personalised information on network coverage, the quality of your calls and data connection and the apps you use.
We do not receive any information about the content of your conversations or messages.
We use your personalised information in certain cases, e.g.:

 • To give you more transparency abour your personal data usage

 • To discover and correct any perfomance restrictions when using your apps or your smartphone

 • To recommend products & services specifically for your contract

Your location data for better network
If you activate location sevices on your devices and your operating system supports this, we also collect information about your location, such as your GPS coordinates or your mobile cell. We collect this information even if you are not actively using the MeinVodafone app.
privacy_permissions_intro_title: Some important updates on your privacy settings
privacy_permissions_intro_content_paragr: At Vodafone, we place great emphasis on the correct use of your personal data.
privacy_permissions_intro_action_title1: Your communications will not be accessed
privacy_permissions_intro_action_title_t: Get the latest offers on our products and services tailored to you
privacy_permissions_intro_action_title3: Keep up-to-date with any information relating to your Account
privacy_permissions_privacy_section1_con: You can change these from your privacy settings.
privacy_permissions_privacy_paragraphOne: Do you want to order our products online? In order to record your order, we collect the necessary data, e.g. B. Your name, your address, your bank details. For our availability check, we use your address (street, house number, postal code, city) to determine the availability of the network, possible speeds and bookable services. You want to communicate with us via a contact form? But of course! We collect the necessary information to recognize you, e.g. B. Your name and your customer number as well as the reason for your contact request. This is how we can solve your request.
privacy_permissions_privacy_paragraphTwo: We use cookies, tags, pixels and similar technologies on our websites and apps. Here you will find information about all cookies and similar technologies that we use (privacy policy tracking)
